name: Connexia
description: Connexia is an Italian data-driven creativity agency blending data, creativity, and technology. Part of the Doxa Group, they offer services including content production, data analysis, search marketing, paid media management, and corporate communication.

Technology & Innovation: Collaboration with Microsoft 365, Google Workspace, Cisco Webex, Zoom
Media Relations, Influencer & Events: Content production via Connexia Media House

team.description: A multicultural and multidisciplinary team passionate about creativity, data-driven thinking, media management, and technological innovation. They emphasize co-creative processes and measurable campaign effectiveness.

values.Benefit Corporation: Balances economic, social, and environmental impact equally.
values.Inclusive agency model: Focuses on talent, collaboration, and creating an ideal work ecosystem.

locations.Legal headquarters: Via Gaetano de Castillia 23 - 20124 Milan (MI), Italy
